alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Chester; Henderson; Madison (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 28 at 4:31PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN HENDERSON... SOUTHWESTERN CARROLL...NORTHEASTERN MADISON AND NORTH CENTRAL CHESTER COUNTIES THROUGH 500 PM CDT... At 431 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Blue Goose, or 11 miles southeast of Milan, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Lexington, Mifflin, Blue Goose, Bargerton, Hickory Flat, Claybrook, Cedar Grove, Mount Gilead, Beech Bluff, Huron, Russell Crossroads, Palestine, Union Cross, Juno, Lavinia, Sand Ridge, Timberlake, Hinson Springs, and White Fern. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
